1504110.name: Grandiose
1504110.description:
You land on an island marked with a few wild animals and the remains of an old base, with the intention of building the most elaborate fortified domain that can be. Build an imposing landscaped pavilion, home to your creations. Electrify the premises, drilling for fuel to power your production instruments. Design a botanical ecosystem, linking flora and fauna, fertilizer and water, and perpetuating life on your land. Raise your herd of wild animals. Build your defenses, and retaliate against attacks from the neighboring island.

Grandiose is the place to put into practice the ingenious and creative abilities of your mind.
